apply

OPERATION: apply

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/fhir/OperationDefinition/PlanDefinition-i-apply

Create a careplan for a specific episodeOfCare using this PlanDefinition as a template.

URL: [base]/PlanDefinition/[id]/$apply

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INepisodeOfCare0..1Reference

name: apply
description: Create a careplan for a specific episodeOfCare using this PlanDefinition as a template.
